trigLib

Class TrigLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • trigLib.TrigLib

  • public abstract class TrigLib
extends java.lang.Object
    TrigLib is a library which provides methods for performing trigonometric functions. Trigonometric functions is performed using Taylor series expansion, accurate to at least 6 decimal places within JUnit assert testing. Methods include sin, cos, tan, sec, csc, cot. Additionally, a method is provided to convert degrees to radians: degreeToRadian(), as well as a method to convert radians back to degrees, you can use radianToDegree().
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Andrew Vu (6044937), GeZhang Zhu (5921648)
